dcterms:creator: Y. LeCun
dcterms:description: MNIST contains 70,000 examples of hand-written digits, of which 60,000 are training data and 10,000 are testing data. Each example is a grayscale image with a resolution of 28 × 28 pixels.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: Y. Netzer
T. Wang
A. Coates
A. Bissacco
B. Wu
A. Y. Ng
dcterms:description: SVHN is a real-world image dataset including over 600,000 digit images. The 'Cropped Digits' set is similar to MNIST, and each sample is a color image with a resolution of 32 × 32 pixels.
dcterms:title: SVHN

dcterms:description: Synthetic SVHN is generated from 250 fonts and 2,500 images from the MNIST training set, synthesizing an SVHN-like dataset with various distortions and noise.
dcterms:title: Synthetic SVHN
